column5: Just finished a week at Ghost River Lodge, on Marchington Lake, 25 miles East of Sioux Lookout. Walleyes absolutely fantastic. Despite severe cold front we scored 44 over 20" with 27" topping the list. Hundreds caught. Nice people, clean, good equipment...This could be walleye heaven.
Heading there in 9 days. Can't wait to get to heaven. Care to share any other info
Heading to ghost river in the morning. Awsome place to fish. Last year was the first time there they will gwt you on the fish.
waterwick and lanceI'm heading to GRL in mid July please let me know how you did,I'll do the same. You can PM me if you want. I was wondering about the water levels.
